User Agreement By using our services, you affirm that you are at least 18 years old or have obtained consent from a parent or legal guardian. 2. Service Usage You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes and in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations. 3. User Privacy We respect your privacy. Any personal information you provide will be handled and used in accordance with our privacy policy. 4. User Responsibility You are fully responsible for the security of your account and any activities that occur on your account. Report any unauthorized use promptly. 5. Updates and Changes We reserve the right to update or change these terms without prior notice. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website. 6. Access Termination We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to our services with or without notice, at our discretion. 7. Intellectual Property Rights Content and materials in our services are protected by copyright and other intellectual property rights. Unauthorized use may violate the law. 8. Indemnification You agree to indemnify us against any claims or losses arising from your use of our services in violation of these terms. Latest update Dec 2023 Accept I Agree to the Terms of Service Recent Airport Clear All Airport Select Search city, country or airport Garuda Indonesia GA207-Economy Cabin Baggage: 10kg 10:00 AM Soekarno Hatta Arrived 1h 30m Covid-19 infopage Traveling During the COVID-19 Pandemic As of the latest update (January 14, 2024), the COVID-19 pandemic continues to impact travel worldwide. It\'s essential to stay informed about the latest developments, travel restrictions, and safety guidelines to ensure a smooth and secure journey. Please note that the situation is dynamic, and information may change rapidly. General Guidelines 1. Stay Informed: Check official government sources, health organizations, and reliable travel websites for the latest information on COVID-19 and travel advisories. 2. Vaccination: Ensure you are fully vaccinated against COVID-19 before traveling. Check the vaccine requirements of your destination and keep a copy of your vaccination card. 3. Health Insurance: Consider purchasing travel insurance that covers COVID-19-related medical expenses and trip cancellations due to the pandemic. Before You Travel Check Entry Requirements: Review the entry requirements of your destination, including any visa, testing, or quarantine requirements. This information may vary based on your nationality and the country you are visiting. COVID-19 Test: Some destinations may require a negative COVID-19 test result before entry. Ensure you understand the type of test accepted, the timing of the test, and where to get tested. Travel Authorization: Some countries may require travelers to obtain specific travel authorizations or permits before entry. Check the official government website of your destination for details. During Your Journey Mask and Hygiene Practices: Follow the recommended hygiene practices, including wearing masks, using hand sanitizers, and practicing social distancing in crowded places. Monitor Your Health: Be vigilant about any symptoms associated with COVID-19. If you feel unwell, seek medical attention and follow the local health protocols. Travel Updates: Stay connected with your airline and monitor travel advisories for any sudden changes in regulations or flight schedules. Upon Arrival Quarantine Requirements: Be aware of any quarantine or isolation requirements at your destination. Plan accordingly and ensure you have the necessary resources during this period. Local Regulations: Familiarize yourself with local COVID-19 regulations, including mask mandates, curfews, and social distancing guidelines. Emergency Contacts: Save local emergency numbers and contact information for your country\'s embassy or consulate at your destination.
